name: International Conference on Impact of Cyber Crime & Security Management in Digital Management "Issue & Challenges"
content: The aim of this International Conference is to create an awareness among the public to know about the cyber crimes and security issues in digital transactions. Importance of protection of the networks from attacks and unauthorized access through internet in the global business and to know that how to secure the online trade through social media and the overall opportunities and challenges faced by the society. This conference helps the students, research scholars and faculty members to know about the awareness on cyber crimes and its preventive security measures. Innovative strategies in digital transactions plays a predominant role in the current scenario. Technology up-gradation and its suitable security systems is a huge challenge in the economy .New approaches and policies can be developed to improve the existing cyber security measures and detection and prevention of cyber crimes in E-Commerce. This will bring a tremendous change in the field of online business transactions.
